optimistic.title: Optimistic Updates
optimistic.note: Click "+1 (will fail)" to see rollback behavior

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.sampleText: This text changes when you switch languages.

prefetch.title: Prefetching
prefetch.description: Hover over buttons to prefetch data, then click to view instantly.
prefetch.hoverHint: Hover over an item to prefetch
prefetch.note: Prefetching on hover improves perceived performance

network.title: Network Status
network.note: TanStack Query pauses queries when offline

httpStatus.title: HTTP Status Codes
httpStatus.description: Click to trigger different HTTP errors and see how they're classified.
httpStatus.clickToTest: Click a status code button above

retryComparison.title: Retry Behavior
retryComparison.description: Compare how recoverable (5xx) vs non-recoverable (4xx) errors are handled.
retryComparison.noteText: 500 errors retry up to 3 times with exponential backoff. 404 errors fail immediately because they're not recoverable.

suspense.title: Loading States
suspense.description: Demonstrates TanStack Query loading states with cache clearing.
suspense.point1: Click clears cache to force re-fetch
suspense.note: TanStack Query manages loading states automatically

parallel.title: Parallel Queries
parallel.note: Uses useQueries to fetch multiple data sources in parallel

websocket.title: WebSocket Real-time
websocket.note: Counter updates from simulated users every few seconds

aiStreaming.title: AI Streaming
aiStreaming.description: Server-Sent Events for real-time text streaming

homePage.title: Vue Template
homePage.subtitle: Production-ready web app template with mobile-first design and Telegram Mini App support

authentication.name: Authentication
authentication.description: Email + OTP verification, Telegram OAuth, password reset flows

rbac.name: Role-Based Access
rbac.description: Admin/Owner/User roles, protected routes, permission checks

realtime.name: Real-Time Data
realtime.description: WebSocket, polling, AI streaming, optimistic updates

mobile.name: Mobile-First Design
mobile.description: Responsive layouts, bottom nav, Telegram Mini App detection

typesat.name: Type-Safe API
typesat.description: Auto-generated TypeScript hooks from OpenAPI schema

i18n.name: i18n + Theming
i18n.description: Multi-language support, dark/light mode out of the box

tanstack.name: TanStack Query Patterns
tanstack.description: 17 interactive demos: caching, mutations, infinite scroll, suspense

dx.name: Developer Experience
dx.description: Hot reload, Make commands, organized monorepo structure

architecture.title: Modern Stack, Clean Architecture
architecture.subtitle: End-to-end type safety from database to UI

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Type Safety
endToEnd.description: OpenAPI schema ‚Üí Kubb generates TypeScript hooks. Change backend, frontend types update automatically.

make.title: Unified Make Commands
make.description: One interface for all apps: make test APP=x, make migration. No Docker/pytest directly.

shared.title: Shared Core Logic
shared.description: Auth, users, payments, email in core/ ‚Äî import into any app. No copy-paste between projects.

hotReload.title: Hot Reload Everywhere
hotReload.description: Edit Python or TypeScript, see changes instantly. No container restarts, no manual rebuilds.

repo.title: Repository Pattern + Flush
repo.description: Clean data access layer. Repositories use flush(), services control transactions. Testable, predictable.

tanstackPatterns.title: TanStack Query Patterns
tanstackPatterns.description: 17 demos showing caching, optimistic updates, infinite scroll, real-time ‚Äî copy patterns directly.

workflow.title: Two Ways to Develop
workflow.subtitle: Localhost for speed, tunnel for Telegram testing

localhost.title: Direct Localhost
localhost.subtitle: Native Vite ‚Äî fastest iteration, no Docker overhead
benefits: ~10x faster warm starts with Vite cache
Direct API calls (CORS enabled in dev)

tunnel.title: Tunnel Mode
tunnel.subtitle: Via nginx + Cloudflare tunnel ‚Äî for Telegram Mini App testing

gateway.title: Gateway Hub
gateway.subtitle: nginx landing page with quick access to all apps
gateway.description: Access at https://local.yourdomain.com/ ‚Äî one hub for tunnel links, localhost ports, and API docs

highlights.title: Fast Builds
highlights.description: Vite hot module replacement for instant feedback

highlights.title: Native Performance
highlights.description: Frontends run locally on macOS, not in Docker containers

highlights.title: Vue 3 Ready
highlights.description: Composition API, script setup, and latest Vue features

included.title: Everything Wired Up
included.subtitle: Not just scaffolding ‚Äî real, working features

addTesting.desc: Add test phases to existing task

structuredTasks.title: Structured Task System
structuredTasks.description: Auto-detects difficulty. Simple tasks: inline enrichment. Hard tasks: hub-and-spoke parallel agents with shared ARCHITECTURE.md to prevent conflicts.

developerAgent.title: Developer Agent
items: Reads pattern docs before every task. Returns summaries, not code dumps.
After changes: make test, make lint, make schema
Commits: follows conventional format per phase

steps.title: Setup Cloudflare Tunnel
steps.desc: Required for Telegram Mini App testing ‚Äî exposes localhost via HTTPS

steps.title: Start building
steps.code: Remove demo code, add your features

single_card.title: Ask a Question
single_card.caption: What would you like a quick answer for?
single_card.suggestions: Will today be a good day?;Should I accept this offer?;Is this person thinking of me?;Will my plan succeed?;Is this the right timing?;What energy surrounds me today?;Should I make this purchase?;Will I receive good news soon?;Is this relationship worth pursuing?;Should I take this risk?;What should I focus on today?;Will this project be successful?;Is this path right for me right now?;What do I need to know today?;Should I trust my intuition on this?

three_card.title: Ask a Question
three_card.caption: What would you like deeper insights about?
three_card.suggestions: How will my relationship evolve over the next few months?;What are the key factors influencing my career path right now?;How can I overcome the challenges I'm currently facing?;What do I need to know about this important decision?;How will this situation unfold?;What energies are surrounding my current life path?;How can I improve my relationship with myself?;What past, present, and future energies are shaping my situation?;What should I know about this opportunity?;How can I navigate through this transition period?;What strengths can I draw upon to succeed?;What is blocking me from achieving my goal?;How can I heal from this experience?;What insights should I consider about my spiritual journey?;What forces are at play in my current circumstances?

yes_no.title: Ask a Yes/No Question
yes_no.caption: What do you need a clear answer for?
yes_no.suggestions: Should I take this job offer?;Is this relationship going to work out?;Will I succeed if I pursue this path?;Is now the right time to make this change?;Should I trust this person?;Is moving to a new location the right choice?;Should I start this business venture?;Will this investment be profitable?;Is this collaboration beneficial for me?;Should I confront this issue directly?;Will my financial situation improve soon?;Should I wait before making this decision?;Is this the right time to ask for a promotion?;Should I pursue higher education now?;Is reconciliation possible in this relationship?

ob_three_card.title: Ask Your Question
ob_three_card.caption: What would you like to explore with three cards?
ob_three_card.suggestions: What energies are influencing my path right now?;How can I make progress in my current situation?;What should I know about my present circumstances?;What challenges and opportunities await me?;How can I grow from my current experiences?;What insights can help me understand my relationships better?;What past influences are still affecting my present?;What potential future is developing from my current actions?;How should I approach this important life decision?;What aspects of myself should I be more aware of?;What hidden factors are influencing my situation?;How can I navigate through current uncertainties?;What is the most important thing to focus on right now?;How can I find better balance in my life?;What do I need to release to move forward?

a_or_b.title: Compare Two Options
a_or_b.caption: What choices would you like to compare?
a_or_b.placeholder: Describe your question about two options...
a_or_b.suggestions: Should I stay in my current job or accept the new offer?;Is it better to move to a new city or remain where I am?;Should I pursue relationship A or relationship B?;Is it better to invest in project X or project Y?;Should I follow my passion or choose the practical path?;Is it better to speak up now or wait for a better time?;Should I commit to this relationship or keep my options open?;Is it better to save money or invest it now?;Should I focus on career growth or work-life balance?;Is it better to work for someone else or start my own business?;Should I continue my education or gain work experience?;Is it better to confront this issue or let it resolve naturally?;Should I trust my head or follow my heart?;Is it better to make this purchase now or wait?;Should I expand my current business or stabilize it first?

situation.title: Describe Your Situation
situation.caption: What situation would you like clarity on?
situation.suggestions: What is happening in my current situation?;How can I best navigate this situation?;What is the true nature of my current circumstances?;What factors are influencing this situation?;What is hidden from me in this situation?;What should I be aware of in this situation?;How will this situation develop?;What opportunities are hidden in this current challenge?;What is the best approach to this situation?;What energy surrounds this situation?;What forces are at play in this circumstance?;How can I find clarity in this confusing situation?;What is the potential outcome of this situation?;What aspects of this situation am I not seeing?;How can I improve this situation?;What can I learn from this situation?;What is the root cause of this situation?;What should I understand about these circumstances?;How can I resolve this difficult situation?;What do I need to release to move past this situation?;What wisdom can the cards reveal about my situation?;What guidance do I need in this situation?;How should I respond to these circumstances?;What is the meaning behind this challenge?;How can I find peace amid this situation?;What action should I take in this situation?;How will this situation affect me in the long term?;What is the silver lining in this difficult situation?;How can I turn this situation to my advantage?;What perspective shift do I need about this situation?

question.subtitle: Enter the two options you want to compare

chat.title: Chat with Tarot Meow
chat.teaserTitle: Darling, we need to talk urgently!;What's new with you, beautiful?;Let's discuss the most important things?;Tell me everything, I want to know the details!;Share your secrets! I won't tell anyone!;Let's talk openly, dear?;What's worrying you, dear?;Let's have a heart-to-heart?
chat.teaserDescription: Tell me everything that's in your heart, I'm here for you!;I'm always here to discuss your news, dreams and secrets!;Let's talk about what's bothering you? I'll understand and accept everything!;You know, I'm always here to support you and discuss what's not spoken aloud.;Want to talk about everything that's important to you right now? I'm already listening!;Chat with me, and we'll find answers together with Tarot!;Let's pause and discuss what's really important right now!;It's very important for me to know how you feel and what's bothering you. Tell me!;Let's talk sincerely? I'm here to help you understand yourself.
